channel.title: drinks on Mostly Harmless Cafe
channel.description: Recent content in drinks on Mostly Harmless Cafe

item.title: Aperol Spritz
item.description: Ingredients ice 3 oz. prosecco 3 oz. aperol subst: select 1 oz. club soda 2 olives (garnish) Instructions Add everything in glass, stir to combine. Optional Serve before lunch

item.title: Hot Chocolate
item.description: Ingredients: 1 ½ cups whole milk 4 oz finely chopped cocoa (usally one square, 100% cocoa) 1 ½ Tbsp sugar 1 Tbsp cocoa powder 1 Tbsp cornstarch Instructions: Put chopped cocoa and a splash of milk into pot on med heat, heat until cocoa has melted. Add sugar and cocoa powder. In separate bowl, mix cornstarch with splash of milk (making a slurry). Stream in slurry, mix until consistent and thickened.

item.title: Irish Car Bomb
item.description: Ingredients: 1 pint Irish stout (personal: Guiness) ½ oz Irish cream ¼ oz coffee liqeur ¼ oz Irish whiskey (personal: Jameson)
